name: ObsessiveCompulsiveDisorderOCDICD10CM
title: Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD) (ICD10CM)
description: This value set contains ICD10CM concepts for obsessive compulsive disorders
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains ICD10CM concepts for obsessive compulsive disorders),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify people diagnosed with an obsessive compulsive disorder. This element may map to "Diagnosis" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concept classified in the ICD10CM system as having both obsessive (i.e., repetitive thoughts) and compulsive (i.e., repetitive behaviors) components.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes compulsive behaviors defined primarily in terms of behavior but without associated obsessions (thoughts). Excludes antisocial and impulse control behaviors such as sexual addictions, gambling disorder, pyromania, etc.)
